title: Daveed Diggs and Rafael Casal on Get Out
itunes:title: Daveed Diggs and Rafael Casal on Get Out
description:
Daveed Diggs won a Tony Award for Hamilton, but has not forgotten his roots. He went out and made a movie with his childhood friend, Rafael Casal. Turns out these guys are super cool and so is their movie, Blindspotting. We talked about the first time filmmaking process, life growing up in Oakland, and then dived into their movie crush... GET OUT. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
